description: {"blocks":[{"key":"98s77","text":"The intent of this Standard Operating Procedure (SOP) is to describe procedures for mouse stereotaxic intracranial injection surgery.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"duh5u","text":"RESPONSIBILITY:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":15}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bf7db","text":"Principal investigator (PI), their staff, or any individual performing stereotaxic surgery on rodents or assisting in those procedures.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3ff9s","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
materials_text: {"blocks":[{"key":"56rmm","text":"MATERIALS:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":10}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"appv5","text":"Anesthetics (e.g. isoflurane) and induction chamber.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"pnbh","text":"           1.2 charcoal filter canisters for isoflurane output","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8jct7","text":"           2. Necessary tubing to connect equipment","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dfrmk","text":"Stereotaxic surgery frame ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"57ear","text":"Drill with 0.5 mm drill bit, power supply, and foot pedal ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cuvu7","text":"Warming pad, anal probe, and power supply","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cv4f4","text":"Injector ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fg82r","text":"Electric clipper ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"aptgd","text":"Non-steroidal analgesic (e.g. carprofen)  ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9lb0d","text":"Sterile 0.9% saline ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4l5ha","text":"Antiseptic solution for skin (e.g., povidone-iodine solution and 70% ethanol) ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bdksg","text":"Sterile ophthalmic ointment ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f23mm","text":"Sterile surgical instruments","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7illp","text":"         1. Scalpel ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cpiet","text":"         2. Blunt Forceps","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fa9vk","text":"         3. Dumont forceps","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"depdp","text":"         4. Fine Scissors","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"92t3b","text":"         5. Needle holder","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fmnbi","text":"Sterile swabs and gelfoam spears ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"87q2b","text":"Sterile drapes ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7poju","text":"Sterile Hamilton syringe (1700 Hmltn, 10uL) ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9eldk","text":"Suture material","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it’s working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"6ve3f","text":"Print the surgery documents and prepare them from Chu Lab SharePoint.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"eabg6","text":"Prepare solutions needed for target injections according Chu Lab Inventory and SOPs from the Chu Lab SharePoint.  Place solutions on ice, if applicable.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"2mk6r","text":"Autoclave the necessary tools to prior to surgery.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"ddo0m","text":"Disinfection surgery station and place down a benchpad.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"52na6","text":"Setup the necessary equipment including:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"elrl","text":"Stereotaxic frame","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1ecd0","text":"Injector","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"aujep","text":"Warming pad","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f5qs1","text":"Drill","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ct405","text":"Induction Chamber","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6j1u6","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"22qce","text":"Check the isoflurane levels. Levels visible on the front of the vaporizer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"62onh","text":"Designate a sterile area on the working surface for the sterile material (instruments, suture material, gauze, etc.).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"t9ua","text":"Clean the Hamilton syringe with sterile water, then 70% ethanol then sterile water again.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"260sl","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8jqht","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"2ktds","text":"Note: Make sure it is not clogged and that the plunger can move up and down smoothly.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3g1a9","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8c3f6","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"dm46m","text":"Anesthetize the animal in induction chamber.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"1vnq0","text":"Note: Perform pre-operative procedures at a safe distance from the surgical environment in order to prevent contamination with hair.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4jlkv","text":"Open valves to oxygen tank and adjust to a flow of   per  . Adjust the level of vaporizer to 3 percent isoflurane in oxygen and wait for the cessation of movement.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":51,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":57,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1","error":false,"guid":"0505B3B0F60211EC8B8241D64C9F722D","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":3}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":60,"guid":"1E348A50F60211EC8B8241D64C9F722D","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cp48l","text":"Shave top of the head and remove hair.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"epklv","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"1qvg6","text":"Return animal to induction chamber if need before next step.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fkv4d","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"8eg8c","text":"This is often done over trash can or away from surgical setup.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"eg4tt","text":"Secure animal in the stereotaxic frame. Once nose cone is in place, close valve to chamber and open valve to nose cone and reduce vaporizer to 1.5-2 percent isoflurane in oxygen.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bj0bk","text":"Apply ophthalmic ointment in both eyes to prevent corneal desiccation. Reapply as needed.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"asnvk","text":"Place anal probe underneath body to regulate temperature. Heating system prove setpoint is  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":91,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"C06402B0F60211EC8B8241D64C9F722D","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"36.9","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"edrqe","text":"Using 70% ethanol on a sterile cotton swab in a circular motion, sterilize surgery site from the center of the surgical site to the exterior.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5qnkh","text":"Expose the cranium by making a surgical anterior-posterior incision with a scalpel blade and reflect the skin.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"e9qh1","text":"Use scope to locate bregma and lambda.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"58h4m","text":"Position needle directly over the intersection with the coronal and sagittal sutures to locate bregma.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3ctvn","text":"Repeat step 17 at the intersection of the lambdoid and sagittal sutures to locate Lambda.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6j8v4","text":"Adjust the level of the skull until there is less than a 50um D-V difference between Bregma and Lambda, and less than a 50um D-V difference between point +2 and -2 mm M-L to Bregma.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d6avg","text":"Calculate target coordinates for injection site using leveled bregma coordinates.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"6uiom","text":"Move needle to target site and mark site using a pencil.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ffpnk","text":"Raise needle and, using the hand-held drill, make a single burr-hole in the skull at the injection site. Clean hole of any blood or debris using sterile saline and gelfoam spears.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"clhm","text":"Draw up necessary volume of solution into the syringe.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6jrgk","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"dtsia","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"1ompl","text":"Lower plunger until a drop of solution is visible at the end of the needle to ensure the solution is at the bottom of the needle and there are no air bubbles.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"a0sqg","text":"Remeasure the D-V coordinate at the dura and calculate the target D-V coordinate.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"egqkh","text":"Gradually lower the injection needle gradually  to target D-V and wait  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":71,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":60,"guid":"4C350D10F60411EC8B8241D64C9F722D","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d4sr0","text":"Check that settings on the injector are correct:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d4nl9","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"48k98","text":"Syringe Settings:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":17}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"aobh8","text":"1700 Hmltn   0.460mm.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":11,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"duqe1","text":"Adjust volume and speed depending on injection.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"45c9q","text":"Check injector is set to infusion.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"10","error":false,"guid":"607DE5F5F60B11ECA0C60A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"87fk3","text":"Press START button on injector to begin injection.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fcl3n","text":"Once injection is done, wait   -  before retracting needle to avoid backflow.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":29,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":32,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9q9kj","text":"For   of 6-OHDA, wait  .","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":4,"length":1},{"key":3,"offset":22,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":180,"guid":"68A5EF50F60411EC8B8241D64C9F722D","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"6DE06F90F60411EC8B8241D64C9F722D","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"2":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1","error":false,"guid":"130977FDF7F711ECB6F60A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"3":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1","duration":600,"error":false,"guid":"1309789CF7F711ECB6F60A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":false,"start":null,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1o4nr","text":"Gradually withdraw needle 500 µm and wait  .  Repeat. Continue to withdraw needle until completely removed from the brain.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":42,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":60,"guid":"8C1DFB80F60411EC8B8241D64C9F722D","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4mvoa","text":"Repeat the procedure if more than one injection is required.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f87mk","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"f0tpf","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"cf9rr","text":"If performing a bilateral set of injections, check that the needle is not blocked before performing the second injection.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9mhss","text":"Suture skin with sterile suture (polyamide-nylon, PDS, Vicryl; size: 3-0 or 5-0) and sterilize skin with betadine.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"47upk","text":"Administer carprofen (5mg/kg, s.c.).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8er3","text":"Remove animal from stereotaxic frame and place animal into a cage on a warming pad.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3bnlo","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cia1n","text":"Document surgery on a surgical procedure cage card and return cage to appropriate room in the vivarium.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dbput","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bek4v","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"21h","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"length":1,"offset":92}],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"7np1f","text":"If injecting a biohazard (e.g. AAV),the animal must be housed in the CH1 biohazard room for   with appropriate labeling.","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"5o80v","text":"","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{"0":{"data":{"duration":259200,"guid":"D96EEEE0F60811EC8B8241D64C9F722D","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null},"mutability":"MUTABLE","type":"duration"}}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fpt8l","text":"Administer Carprofen (5mg/kg, s.c.) the next day.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9l4mq","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9tio1","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"ajuer","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"41h9l","text":"If mouse was injected with 6-OHDA, supplement with additional food (e.g. yogurt drops) to avoid excessive weight loss.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bbe2h","text":"Continue daily observations for 3 days post-operation and record on the back of the surgical procedure cage card.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e140i","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2d2do","text":"Check the needle is straight before beginning and replace if it appears bent.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"b5qk2","text":"Secure to needle to stereotaxic frame and adjust out of the way to avoid contact with needle.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5uraf","text":"Then apply povidone-iodine solution using cotton swabs in a circular motion from the center of the surgical site to the exterior. Repeat this process for a second time.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bg8iu","text":"They will become more prominent over time and hydrogen peroxide solution can be applied to the skull to facilitate identification.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"4e3tc","text":"Lower needle until it just touches the surface of the skull.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2uqd1","text":"Record the A-P, M-L, and D-V coordinates of Bregma.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"880pg","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"cghmf","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"6ft89","text":"Note: For assistance, refer to photo reference on surgery document.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"d27ht","text":"Record the A-P, M-L and D-V coordinates of Lambda.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"7i85m","text":"Observe until animal is awaking and regained righting reflexes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9jr7e","text":"Extend observation period as necessary to ensure a healthy recovery.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: Standard Operating Procedure: Mouse Stereotaxic Intracranial Injection Surgery
title_html: Standard Operating Procedure: Mouse Stereotaxic Intracranial Injection Surgery

versions.title: Standard Operating Procedure: Mouse Stereotaxic Intracranial Injection Surgery
versions.title_html: Standard Operating Procedure: Mouse Stereotaxic Intracranial Injection Surgery
